title: T206 PSA Sovereign 460s for sale with Matty and HOF
author: t206kid

posts.post_title: T206 PSA Sovereign 460s for sale with Matty and HOF
posts.post_content:
Selling some very nice PSA Sovereign 460s. Prices include shipping but FF please. PM or email [url]vettejayk@aol.com[/url]

- Mathewson dark cap PSA 3.5 - $1100
- McGraw with glove PSA 3mk (Bray Collection) - $200
- Marquard pitching PSA 2 (Bray Collection) - sold
- Duffy SGC 20 - $150
- Devore PSA 5.5 - $270
- Crandall with cap PSA 3 (Bray Collection) - $115
- Bescher hands up PSA 2 (Bray Collection) - $75
